TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/TreeView extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains classes that provide objects for the parts of the tree view control. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TreeView> class provides a foundation in which the following classes are defined:
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TreeView.Branch>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TreeView.Glyph>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TreeView.Item>
Each of these classes provides one or more properties that return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for the tree view part specified by the class name.
